page.title: 05Farming in Sydling.
page.content: Up until the time of writing this village was owned by Winchester College. They are now in the process of selling it all so there have been and will be great changes taking place over the next few years. Up Sydling farm, Ham Farm, Lamperts Farm part of Court Farm and Sherrings Farm have all changed hands and new farmers have taken over. Huish Farm is the only one left unaltered. Old barns that still belong to Winchester College are being sold one by one to outside developers and each planning application is fiercely contended by the Parish Council. Winchester College after years of uninterested neglect have suddenly realized what a little gold mine this beautiful valley is.
